name: NEOIA
description:
During the battle in deep space you have an opportunity to be injected into the enemies flagship cruiser in order to turn off the shield system of the spaceship. Will you be able go through the internal defence  and destroy the generator allowing your side to win the fight?

Top down shooter highly focused on procedural generation of content, including game map, enemies and weapons characteristics.
The current early release version (v0.2X) include:

  • Basic rogue-like  Loop game mod with infinite generation of levels
  • 9 type of enemies, 4 bosses
  • 9 basic types of weapons with additional randomized characteristics
  • 11 items including upgrades of the weapons

v0.10 - originally made for #proceduraldeathjam (http://proceduraldeathjam.com/) in 2014 (?)
